mapper.select:
select
from lock_key_tb where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_flag=1
mapper.delete: delete from lock_key_tb where lock_id = #{lockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and key_id= #{keyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into lock_key_tb (id, lock_id, key_id, bind_time,is_flag,position,state) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bindTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{isFlag},#{position},#{state})

insert into lock_key_tb
id,
lock_id,
key_id,
bind_time,
is_flag,
position,
state
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{lockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{keyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bindTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isFlag},
#{position},
state
mapper.update:
update lock_key_tb
lock_id = #{lockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
key_id = #{keyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bind_time = #{bindTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_flag = #{isFlag},
position = #{position},
state = #{state}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT keytb.* from key_tb keytb INNER JOIN lock_key_tb lockkey on keytb.key_id = lockkey.key_id INNER JOIN lock_tb locktb on lockkey.lock_id = locktb.lock_id where locktb.lock_id = #{lockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lockkey.is_flag=1
select lockkey.lock_id from lock_key_tb lockkey INNER JOIN key_tb keytb on lockkey.key_id = keytb.key_id where keytb.device_id = #{deviceId}
select id,lock_id,key_id,is_flag ,position,state from lock_key_tb where lock_id = #{lockId} and key_id = #{keyId}
select id,lock_id,key_id,is_flag,position,state from lock_key_tb where key_id = #{keyId}

select lockkey.id,lockkey.lock_id,lockkey.key_id,lockkey.is_flag,lockkey.position,lockkey.state,keytb.* from lock_key_tb lockkey INNER JOIN lock_tb locks on locks.lock_id = lockkey.lock_id INNER JOIN user_lock_tb userlock on userlock.lock_id = locks.lock_id inner join key_tb keytb on keytb.key_id = lockkey.key_id where userlock.open_id = #{openId} and lockkey.is_flag = 1 and lockkey.key_id = #{keyId} and userlock.lock_id = #{lockId}

select lockkey.id from lock_key_tb lockkey INNER JOIN lock_tb locks on locks.lock_id = lockkey.lock_id INNER JOIN user_lock_tb userlock on userlock.lock_id = locks.lock_id where userlock.open_id = #{openId} and lockkey.is_flag = 1 and lockkey.key_id = #{keyId}

select lockkey.*,keytb.* from lock_key_tb lockkey inner join key_tb keytb on keytb.key_id = lockkey.key_id inner join user_lock_tb userlock on userlock.lock_id = lockkey.lock_id where lockkey.lock_id = #{lockId} and userlock.open_id = #{openId}and lockkey.is_flag='1'
mapper.delete: delete from temp_tb where openid=#{openId} and keyid = #{keyId}
